greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of square root of 13.
comment: Continued fraction expansion is 3 followed by {1, 1, 1, 1, 6} repeated. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 02 2009
The convergents to sqrt(13) are given in A041018/A041019. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Nov 23 2017
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
program: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=sqrt(13); for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b010470.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 02 2009
xref: Cf. A010122 (continued fraction), A041018/A041019 (convergents), A248242 (Egyptian fraction), A171983 (Beatty sequence).
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
